name: Auto Definition
short_description: For most Chinese students, memorizing English vocabulary has never been harder? Question is, with what? This app helps you print out vocabulary lists within minutes. No more vocabulary books, heavy and not portable, with a lot of words listed you ALREADY know! The output lists are plain text, easy to be customized in your way. PS: print using fixed-width typefaces.
summary: a must-have tool for English learners on vocabulary

screenshots.caption: Making your own printable vocabulary list! Definitions provided by Dict.cn.
